name: iPad® mini 4
highlights:
7.9-inch Retina display with anti-reflective coating (diagonal)
A8 second-generation chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture
Touch ID fingerprint sensor
8MP iSight camera with 1080p video
1.2 FaceTime HD camera
802.11ac Wi-Fi with MIMO
addToCartMessage: Quantities are limited. Please call your local store for availability.
categoryIcons:
Access the 4G LTE network* to send and receive pictures, download music, watch videos and browse the Internet at speeds up to 10 times faster than 3G. *4G LTE network available only in select cities. See coverage map for details.

Data Plan Required
talkTime: Up to 10 hours of surfng the web on Wi-Fi, watching video, or listening to music
deviceFinancingTargeter: If you have financed your device, the financed installment amount is not displayed, and will increase the Total Due Monthly amount on your actual bill.
